verses.verse: Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> not, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, for joy <WH1524>, as other people <WH5971>: for thou hast gone a whoring <WH2181> <WH8804> from thy 'Elohim <WH430>, thou hast loved <WH157> <WH8804> a reward <WH868> upon every cornfloor <WH1637> <WH1715>.
The floor <WH1637> and the winepress <WH3342> shall not feed <WH7462> <WH8799> them, and the new wine <WH8492> shall fail <WH3584> <WH8762> in her.

They shall not dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in the YY'S <WH3068> land <WH776>; but Efrayim <WH669> shall return <WH7725> <WH8804> to Egypt <WH4714>, and they shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> unclean <WH2931> things in Ashur <WH804>.

They shall not offer <WH5258> <WH8799> wine <WH3196> offerings to the YY <WH3068>, neither shall they be pleasing <WH6149> <WH8799> unto him: their sacrifices <WH2077> shall be unto them as the bread <WH3899> of mourners <WH205>; all that eat <WH398> <WH8802> thereof shall be polluted <WH2930> <WH8691>: for their bread <WH3899> for their soul <WH5315> shall not come <WH935> <WH8799> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.
What will ye do <WH6213> <WH8799> in the solemn <WH4150> day <WH3117>, and in the day <WH3117> of the feast <WH2282> of the YY <WH3068> ?

For, lo, they are gone <WH1980> <WH8804> because of destruction <WH7701>: Egypt <WH4714> shall gather them up <WH6908> <WH8762>, Memphis <WH4644> shall bury <WH6912> <WH8762> them: the pleasant <WH4261> places for their silver <WH3701>, nettles <WH7057> shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799> them: tshofars <WH2336> shall be in their tabernacles <WH168>.

The days <WH3117> of visitation <WH6486> are come <WH935> <WH8804>, the days <WH3117> of recompence <WH7966> are come <WH935> <WH8804>; Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> it: the prophet <WH5030> is a fool <WH191>, the spiritual <WH7307> man <WH376> is mad <WH7696> <WH8794>, for the multitude <WH7230> of thine iniquity <WH5771>, and the great <WH7227> hatred <WH4895>.

The watchman <WH6822> <WH8802> of Efrayim <WH669> was with my 'Elohim <WH430>: but the prophet <WH5030> is a snare <WH6341> of a fowler <WH3352> in all his ways <WH1870>, and hatred <WH4895> in the house <WH1004> of his 'Elohim <WH430>.

They have deeply <WH6009> <WH8689> corrupted <WH7843> <WH8765> themselves, as in the days <WH3117> of Giv`ah <WH1390>: therefore he will remember <WH2142> <WH8799> their iniquity <WH5771>, he will visit <WH6485> <WH8799> their sins <WH2403>.

I found <WH4672> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478> like grapes <WH6025> in the wilderness <WH4057>; I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> your fathers <WH1> as the firstripe <WH1063> in the fig tree <WH8384> at her first time <WH7225>: but they went <WH935> <WH8804> to Baalpeor <WH1187>, and separated <WH5144> <WH8735> themselves unto that shame <WH1322>; and their abominations <WH8251> were according as they loved <WH157> <WH8800>.
As for Efrayim <WH669>, their glory <WH3519> shall fly away <WH5774> <WH8709> like a bird <WH5775>, from the birth <WH3205> <WH8800>, and from the womb <WH990>, and from the conception <WH2032>.

Though they bring up <WH1431> <WH8762> their children <WH1121>, yet will I bereave <WH7921> <WH8765> them, that there shall not be a man <WH120> left: yea, woe <WH188> also to them when I depart <WH5493> <WH8800> from them!

Efrayim <WH669>, as I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> Tyrus <WH6865>, is planted <WH8362> <WH8803> in a pleasant place <WH5116>: but Efrayim <WH669> shall bring forth <WH3318> <WH8687> his children <WH1121> to the murderer <WH2026> <WH8802>.

Give <WH5414> <WH8798> them, O YY <WH3068>: what wilt thou give <WH5414> <WH8799>? give <WH5414> <WH8798> them a miscarrying <WH7921> <WH8688> womb <WH7358> and dry <WH6784> <WH8802> breasts <WH7699>.

All their wickedness <WH7451> is in Gilgal <WH1537>: for there I hated <WH8130> <WH8804> them: for the wickedness <WH7455> of their doings <WH4611> I will drive them out <WH1644> <WH8762> of mine house <WH1004>, I will love <WH160> them no more <WH3254> <WH8686>: all their princes <WH8269> are revolters <WH5637> <WH8802>.

Efrayim <WH669> is smitten <WH5221> <WH8717>, their root <WH8328> is dried up <WH3001> <WH8804>, they shall bear <WH6213> <WH8799> no fruit <WH6529>: yea, though they bring forth <WH3205> <WH8799>, yet will I slay <WH4191> <WH8689> even the beloved <WH4261> fruit of their womb <WH990>.
My 'Elohim <WH430> will cast them away <WH3988> <WH8799>, because they did not hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> unto him: and they shall be wanderers <WH5074> <WH8802> among the nations <WH1471>.
